availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Lucretia Martin Satterfield in Caldwell County, Kentucky, on February 2, 1835. Father of Permelia Satterfield, Martha A. Satterfield, James Satterfield, Mary E. Satterfield, Felix Satterfield, Alecy Satterfield, Sarah Satterfield, Thomas Satterfield, and Fannie Satterfield. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1850. Farmer in Princeton in 1860. Justice of the peace in Caldwell County in 1861.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 2, p. 377B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Princeton, p. 34.
"John Satterfield (1814-1872)," Find A Grave, Memorial #25947629, accessed April 12, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/25947629.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Caldwell County Marriages, Film #000851644.
KYR-0001-020-0012.
